mean_cn: n. 手风琴；  adj. 可折叠的
mean_en: a musical instrument that is shaped like a box and that is held in your hands and played by pulling its sides apart and then pushing them together while pressing buttons and keys
word_etyma: accord一致，和音 ＋ ion名词后缀 → accordion 手风琴
sentence: Bob has mastered the accordion after 10 years of playing.
sentence_trans: 鲍勃掌握手风琴已经十年了。
